price: Serán rodeados por sirvientes, bellos como perlas guardadas.
arabic: ۞ وَيَطُوفُ عَلَيۡهِمۡ غِلۡمَانٞ لَّهُمۡ كَأَنَّهُمۡ لُؤۡلُؤٞ مَّكۡنُونٞ

version.title: Spanish Translation - Isa Garcia
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Spanish by Muhammad Isa Garcia - Printed in 1433 H.

meta.transliteration: wayaṭūfu ʿalayhim ghil'mānun lahum ka-annahum lu'lu-on maknūnun
